name: Intrepid Travel
description: World's largest purpose-led adventure travel company, offering over 1,000 escorted tours across all seven continents in more than 120 countries. Founded in 1989, Intrepid specializes in small group tours led by local guides, using public transport and staying at locally owned accommodations. The company is a certified B Corporation and has been carbon neutral since 2010, operating through multiple brands including Intrepid Travel, Urban Adventures, Peregrine Adventures, and Intrepid DMC.
